Package Main_Logic

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main_Logic.Store
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a store. All commands will be acted on objects of this class. Implements Serializable interface. Implements the Singleton design pattern.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Currency> currencies
      A list of all the currencies loaded into the store, represented as an ArrayList of Currency type objects.
      private Currency currency
      The saved currency of the store at a moment in time, represented as an object of type Currency.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Discount> discounts
      A list of discounts, represented as an ArrayList of Discount type objects.
      private static Store INSTANCE
      The static instance of the Store singleton class.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Manufacturer> manufacturers
      A list of all manufacturers of the products in the store, represented as an ArrayList of Manufacturer type objects.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the store, represented as a string.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Product> products
      A list of all products loaded into the store, represented as an ArrayList of Product type objects.

        A list of all the currencies loaded into the store, represented as an ArrayList of Currency type objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Store

        private Store()
        No argument constructor. Initialises the store's name to its default value and allocates memory for lists. Also adds the 2 default currencies of the store: EUR and GBP.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Store getInstance()
        Gets the store singleton instance.
        Returns:
        The store singleton instance.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for name.
        Returns:
        The name of the store.

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Setter for name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be set.

      • getCurrency

        public Currency getCurrency()
        Getter for currency.
        Returns:
        The currency of the store.

      • changeCurrency

        public void changeCurrency​(java.lang.String currencyName)
                    throws CurrencyNotFoundException
        Setter for currency. Sets the current currency of the store to a different one from the currencies list. If the new currency is set successfully, the prices of all products are converted to their respective new prices.
        Parameters:
        currencyName - The name of the currency to be set.
        Throws:
        CurrencyNotFoundException - If the currency to be added to the list does not exist, the method throws a CurrencyNotFoundException.

      • getProducts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProducts()
        Getter for products.
        Returns:
        The products of the store.

      • setProducts

        public void setProducts​(java.util.ArrayList<Product> products)
        Setter for products.
        Parameters:
        products - The products to be set.

      • getManufacturers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Manufacturer> getManufacturers()
        Getter for manufacturers.
        Returns:
        The manufacturers of the store.

      • setManufacturers

        public void setManufacturers​(java.util.ArrayList<Manufacturer> manufacturers)
        Setter for manufacturers.
        Parameters:
        manufacturers - The manufacturers to be set.

      • getCurrencies

        public java.util.ArrayList<Currency> getCurrencies()
        Getter for currencies.
        Returns:
        The currencies of the store.

      • setCurrencies

        public void setCurrencies​(java.util.ArrayList<Currency> currencies)
        Setter for name.
        Parameters:
        currencies - The currencies to be set.

      • readCSV

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> readCSV​(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads a CSV file and loads all products it contains into the store. The products prices get converted to the store's current currency. The method uses a CSVParser type object from the org.apache.commons library for the actual file reading.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file from which the products will be read, represented as a string.
        Returns:
        The products list of the store.

      • saveCSV

        public void saveCSV​(java.lang.String filename)
        Writes all the products information in the store to a CSV file. The method uses a CSVWriter type object from the com.opencsv library for the actual file writing.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file that the products information will be written to.

      • saveStore

        public void saveStore​(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the current state of the store in a binary file, using the writeObject method from the Serializable interface
        Parameters:
        filename - The path to the file that the current state of the store will be written to, represented as a string.

      • loadStore

        public void loadStore​(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads a prior store state from a binary file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The path to the file that the prior store state will be read from, represented as a string.

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct​(Product product)
                throws DuplicateProductException
        Adds a product to the products list.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be added to the list.
        Throws:
        DuplicateProductException - If the product to be added already exists in the products list, it does not get added and a DuplicateProductException gets thrown.

      • listProdByMan

        public void listProdByMan​(Manufacturer manufacturer)
        Prints all products information of a certain manufacturer to the output terminal.
        Parameters:
        manufacturer - The manufacturer of which the products information will be displayed.

      • getProductsByIDs

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProductsByIDs​(java.lang.String[] IDs)
        Gets all products that have certain unique IDs.
        Parameters:
        IDs - The IDs of the desired products, represented as an array of strings.
        Returns:
        The list of desired products.

      • showProduct

        public void showProduct​(java.lang.String id)
        Prints the information of a certain product, based on its unique ID, to the output terminal.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the product to be shown.

      • listProducts

        public void listProducts()
        Prints the information of all products in the store to the output terminal.

      • showTotal

        public void showTotal​(java.lang.String[] IDs)
        Prints the total price of products with certain IDs to the output terminal.
        Parameters:
        IDs - The list of IDs of the products to be printed, represented as an array of strings.

      • addManufacturer

        public void addManufacturer​(Manufacturer manufacturer)
                     throws DuplicateManufacturerException
        Adds a manufacturer to the manufacturers list.
        Parameters:
        manufacturer - The manufacturer to be added to the list.
        Throws:
        DuplicateManufacturerException - If the manufacturer to be added already exists in the manufacturers list, it does not get added and a DuplicateManufacturerException gets thrown.

      • listManufacturers

        public void listManufacturers()
        Prints the information of all manufacturers in the store to the output terminal.

      • createCurrency

        public Currency createCurrency​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String symbol,
                               double parityToEur)
        Adds a new currency to the currencies list. If the currency already exists in the list, it does not get added and is simply returned.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the currency to be added.
        symbol - The symbol of the currency to be added.
        parityToEur - The parity to Euro of the currency to be added.
        Returns:
        The newly added currency.

      • listCurrencies

        public void listCurrencies()
        Prints all currencies to the output terminal.

      • showCurrency

        public void showCurrency()
        Prints the current currency of the store to the output terminal.

      • updateParity

        public void updateParity​(java.lang.String currencyName,
                         double newParity)
        Updates the parity to Euro of a currency in the list of currencies (and the currently loaded one, if it is the same as the desired one in the list)
        Parameters:
        currencyName - The name of the currency to be updated, represented as a string.
        newParity - The new parity to Euro of the currency, represented as a double.

      • createDiscount

        public void createDiscount​(Discount.DiscountType discountType,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           double value)
        Adds a new discount to the discounts list. If the discount already exists in the list, it does not get added.
        Parameters:
        discountType - The discount type (fixed or percentage).
        name - The discount name.
        value - The discount value.

      • applyDiscount

        public void applyDiscount​(Discount discount)
                   throws DiscountNotFoundException,
                          NegativePriceException
        Applies a certain discount to all products in the store.
        Parameters:
        discount - The discount to be applied.
        Throws:
        DiscountNotFoundException - If the discount to be applied does not exist in the discounts list, a DiscountNotFoundException is thrown.
        NegativePriceException - If by applying the discount to the products, at least one's price would become negative, a NegativePriceException is thrown.

      • listDiscounts

        public void listDiscounts()
        Prints all discounts information to the output terminal.

      • parseManufacturer

        private Manufacturer parseManufacturer​(java.lang.String manufacturerString)
        Private helper method. Processes a manufacturer name string from a products CSV file. Helps in the creation of Product type objects when loading a CSV file into the store.
        Parameters:
        manufacturerString - The name of the manufacturer, represented as a string
        Returns:
        The new manufacturer type object.

      • parseQuantity

        private int parseQuantity​(java.lang.String quantityString)
        Private helper method. Processes the quantity string of a product from a CSV file. Helps in the creation of Product type objects when loading a CSV file into the store.
        Parameters:
        quantityString - The string containing the quantity of the product.
        Returns:
        The quantity of the product.

      • convertStringToPrice

        private double convertStringToPrice​(java.lang.String priceString)
        Private helper method. Converts a price string from a CSV file into a double.
        Parameters:
        priceString - The string containing the price.
        Returns:
        The price of the product.

      • convertPrice

        private double convertPrice​(double price,
                            java.lang.String currencySymbol)
                     throws CurrencyNotFoundException
        Private helper function. Converts a price in a certain currency to the current currency of the store.
        Parameters:
        price - The price to be converted.
        currencySymbol - The old currency symbol of the price.
        Returns:
        The new converted price.
        Throws:
        CurrencyNotFoundException - If the old currency of the price does not exist in the currencies list of the store, a CurrencyNotFoundException is thrown.

      • convertAllPrices

        private void convertAllPrices​(Currency oldCurrency)
        Private helper function. Converts all product prices from the store from a certain currency to the current currency of the store.
        Parameters:
        oldCurrency - The old currency of the prices.

      • getProductsByManufacturer

        private java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProductsByManufacturer​(Manufacturer manufacturer)
        Private helper function. Gets all products made by a certain manufacturer.
        Parameters:
        manufacturer - The manufacturer that produces the desired products.
        Returns:
        The products produced by the manufacturer, represented as an ArrayList of Product type objects.

      • calculateTotal

        private double calculateTotal​(java.util.ArrayList<Product> products)
        Calculates the total price of all products in a list.
        Parameters:
        products - The list of products, represented as an ArrayList of Product type objects.
        Returns:
        The total price of the products in the list, represented as a double.

      • copyStore

        private void copyStore​(Store store)
        Private helper function. Copies all fields from the store. Helps in the reading of a previous store state from a binary file.
        Parameters:
        store - The store to be copied.
